tags: Services de messagerie interne et externe
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Title: Internal and External Courier Services for Fisheries and Oceans Canada, Quebec Offices

Background:
Fisheries and Oceans Canada, Quebec Region is seeking a specialized firm to provide internal and external courier services for its regional office in Quebec City.

We are looking for a provider that can offer a reliable and efficient delivery service, including:

* Receiving and sending mail and parcels
* Processing mail as directed by the organization
* Sorting internal mail from various locations
* Stamp outgoing mail and parcels according to Canada Post standards or equivalent

The provider will be expected to:

* Pick up and deliver mail and parcels to our internal and external customers
* Maintain distribution lists and pigeonhole identification
* Provide detailed monthly and cumulative reports on expenditures

Equipment and Materials:
The provider must supply the necessary equipment, including:

* Standard operating equipment (scale, stamping machine, postage meter, etc.)
* Stamping labels and ink
* Trolleys for internal courier services
* Stationery and supplies (excluding envelopes)
* A computer and printer meeting Fisheries and Oceans Canada standards
* Appropriate vehicles for courier service and transportation of archival boxes

Key Dates:

* Tender closing date: June 6th, 2023, at 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)
* Expected contract start date: July 1st, 2023
* Expected contract end date: March 31st, 2025

Trade Agreements: This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and other trade agreements specified in the bid documents.

Contact Information:
For further information, please contact Ashley Potter at (613) 432-1855 or ashley.potter@dfo-mpo.gc.ca.

Bid Documents:
The bid documents, including the tender description and technical specifications, are available on the Government of Canada's tendering website.

Note: This tender is currently closed, and no further submissions will be accepted.
